General.Name: Tungkong Inc
General.Description: Tungkong Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides printing media services in the People's Republic of China. The company designs and prints bills and forms comprising anti-counterfeiting forms and negotiable instruments for government, banking, insurance, finance, taxation, post, telecommunications, transportation, and civil affairs sectors; produces e-invoices, e-documents, and lottery products, as well as smart cards for financial, healthcare, social security, transportation, commercial, retail, insurance, and other industries; and offers color printing services. It also provides data processing services and office paper products; and RFID products, such as tickets, paper film cards, PVC cards, electronic tickets, electric labels, library labels, logistics labels, clothing tags, aviation luggage receipts, CD labels, anti-counterfeiting wine labels, intercity train tickets, etc. In addition, the company prints anti-counterfeiting labels, smart labels, aviation labels, digital printing labels, and normal labels. Tungkong Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jinan, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 23, Shanda North Road, Jinan, China, 250100
